title: BP
description: BP's brand colors include green and yellow hues, often associated with sustainability and vitality. Known for its deep 'British Racing Green' (#00A650), bright lime (#80C242), and vibrant yellow (#FFD903), these colors emphasize BP's commitment to energy advancement and transformation. The white (#FFFFFF) offers a clean, neutral complement, highlighting transparency and efficiency. This palette has been identified on brand-related assets and marketing materials from their official site.
